Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a promising energy conversion technology for accelerating the process of carbon neutrality.
Titulo: Thermodynamics and electrochemical performance of co- and counter-flow planar solid oxide fuel cells under an adiabatic operation environment

Sentencas: This paper develops and validates a 1D mathematical model for a planar SOFC (10 cm x 10 cm) along the fluid flow direction with a less than 0.2% deviation.
Titulo: Thermodynamics and electrochemical performance of co- and counter-flow planar solid oxide fuel cells under an adiabatic operation environment

Sentencas: When the SOFC operates in an adiabatic environment with different inlet gas temperatures (Tin) and current density (Iavg), the distributions of its key parameters are calculated and analyzed.
Titulo: Thermodynamics and electrochemical performance of co- and counter-flow planar solid oxide fuel cells under an adiabatic operation environment

Sentencas: The results show that the optimal inlet gas temperature for the SOFC working in an adiabatic environment is between 873 K and 973 K when Iavg varies from 0.05 A cm-2 to 0.25 A cm-2.
Titulo: Thermodynamics and electrochemical performance of co- and counter-flow planar solid oxide fuel cells under an adiabatic operation environment

Sentencas: The maximum temperature appears at the outlet position and between the outlet and the center point along the flue flow for the co-flow and counter-flow SOFC.
Titulo: Thermodynamics and electrochemical performance of co- and counter-flow planar solid oxide fuel cells under an adiabatic operation environment

Sentencas: Compared with the co-flow pattern, the counter-flow design can benefit the fuel cell power output when Tin and Iavg are identical, especially with lower Tin and higher Iavg.
Titulo: Thermodynamics and electrochemical performance of co- and counter-flow planar solid oxide fuel cells under an adiabatic operation environment

Sentencas: The output power of counter-flow SOFC is larger 11.3% than that of the co -flow one at most with the research range in this work.(c) 2023 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Thermodynamics and electrochemical performance of co- and counter-flow planar solid oxide fuel cells under an adiabatic operation environment
